title: Restore Admin Entry Point in UI

requirements.text: Add an Admin entry point back into the public UI so the admin area can be accessed again (link to the existing /admin/login route), and ensure it is available on both desktop and mobile navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation includes an "Admin" (or "Admin Login") link that navigates to "/admin/login" on desktop.
Mobile navigation includes the same "Admin" (or "Admin Login") link that navigates to "/admin/login".
Footer Quick Links includes an "Admin" (or "Admin Login") link that navigates to "/admin/login".
The existing admin routes remain unchanged: "/admin" continues to be protected and "/admin/login" remains the login entry point.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional canisters/services.
nonGoals: Redesigning or rebuilding the Admin Dashboard features/tabs (they already exist).
Changing the admin authentication mechanism or credentials.
